name: SE2-12 — ROYALE LANTERN
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Anse Royale, Mahé. Royale rests with two small lights.
Loop the rope and climb to council.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: two star glints; rope loop = numeric offset.
properties.clue:
Royale rests with two small lights.
Loop the rope and climb to council.
properties.visual_description: Calm bay; lantern reflection; rope forms a figure-2 loop; parrot on signpost.
